site.title: alex malvehy
site.description: A student and self-taught graphic and motion designer from Barcelona who specializes in branding, visual identity, and graphics for television and streaming, continually learning and evolving.

about.catch: I'm Alex Malvehy, a student and self-taught graphic and motion designer from Barcelona. I specialize in branding, visual identity, and graphics for television and streaming, continually learning and evolving.

contact.catch: Do you have a project, idea, or just want to get some info? In either case, don't hesitate to reach out to me, and we'll figure things out.
